body.p: offers many helper views that you can arrange in different layouts to match your needs. Use the Perspectives Layout preferences page to configure your preferred layout.

ul.li: Allow detaching editors from main window - this option allows you to drag and drop an editor window outside of the main screen. This is useful especially when you are using two monitors and you want to view files in parallel;In case the main screen is maximized, you can not drag and drop an editor outside of it.
View tab placement - specifies whether the View tab is presented at the top or bottom of the window;
Editor tab placement - specifies whether the Editor tab is presented at the top or bottom of the window.

body.p: The changes you make to any layout are preserved between working sessions. Also, changing to a different layout and returning to the previous one does not alter the changes you made to the first layout. The predefined layout files are saved in the preferences directory of .
